summary:
- Usability - Cognitive walkthroughs, Heuristic evaluations and accessibility
- Wireframing and prototyping
- Using Axure/Prototyper/Indigo Studio + Inkscape
- Implementing the Yahoo finance home page and portfolio pages from scratch.
- Using a tech stack of Fluxible app, Webpack, REST, SASS and Atomic CSS.

- Design and development for all of salesforce developer marketing events
- Interaction design for Dreamforce and Trailheadx event sites
- Interaction design for Salesforce Developer Documentation
- Using Rxjs, React, webpack, ES6 to implement a publishing platform for Salesforce event marketing

- Usability - Cognitive walkthroughs, Heuristic evaluations and accessibility
- Wireframing and prototyping
- Using Axure/Prototyper/Indigo Studio + Inkscape
- Implementing the Yahoo finance home page and portfolio pages from scratch.
- Using a tech stack of Fluxible app, Webpack, REST, SASS and Atomic CSS.

- Worked on the redesign of the Yahoo Finance mobile-website.
- The project was deployed in Nov 2013.

- Designed, wireframed and implemented the interface for the STEP - a scholarly text editing platform - funded by the NEH.
- Created instructional videos and conducted usability tests.

- Created interactive surveys to analyze the uncanny valley effect for research experiments.
- Created a hulu-like survey to conduct a ~20 day long participatory research experiment.

- Implemented and deployed the Oracle Fusion Search.
- Implemented the front end of Oracle Fusion VSOE Revenue Management using ADF components.
- Conducted recruitment interviews.

- Created and deployed 8 J2EE web services for BSNL Telecom.
- Managed a team of 4.
- Conducted recruitment interviews.
- Conducted training sessions and handled offsite customer support
